posts.post_content: Everything either moved to my for sale thread or cracked. Thanks for opening this thread anyway!

Great idea. I have around 500 different raw T206's that I want to get graded eventually, to match the 1000+ graded one's I have. But mine are nearly all non Piedmont/Sweet Caporals. The few that you do have, I already have those in graded form already. Maybe if you get others in the future, I might have something that would work in a trade.

Giving this a bump, no interest first time around. I think I will move the Piedmont/Sweet Cap cards (minus Krause) into my for sale thread in a few days. I should be able to find raw copies of those cards without much issue. Still hoping to trade for raw versions of the off backs of what remains.
